para.text: The ATC arm unit performs a series of tool change operation automatically, such as receiving tools indexed in the tool magazine at the tool change position, attaching the tools to the spindle head and returning the used tools back to the tool magazine. The tool magazine is driven by a servomotor with a reduction gear box.
